biotools.summary:
AcrHub is an integrative database to provide an all-in-one user-friendly solution for anti-CRISPR proteins (Acr) investigation, prediction, mapping and relationship analysis.

Bacteria and archaea have developed a wide variety of CRISPR-Cas systems to protect themselves from harmful mobile genetic elements (MGEs), such as phages and plasmids.
